website_summaries.verdict: Lite Brix toys stands apart from the crowd with their vibrant LEDs, and the colorful lights certainly add an extra level of charm to this Peanuts themed set.
pros: Built-in LEDs make Lucy’s lemonade stand glow in an array of rainbow colors
Includes Lucy and Charlie Brown figures

customer_reviews.title: ... collection for my 23 year old daughter who has loved snoopy since she was a baby
customer_reviews.text: I bought the whole collection for my 23 year old daughter who has loved snoopy since she was a baby. They were supposed to be a cute little Christmas gift, but I gave her one when she was visiting. Next thing we know I had given her all five sets. We had a blast watching her put them together, laughing and joking like we were all kids. Thanks for the fun.
customer_reviews.author: Debi Webb

customer_reviews.title: Sure to be enjoyed!
customer_reviews.text: With Legos being so popular I was thrilled to find Peanuts Legos for a special little friend of mine!
customer_reviews.author: Sue C.

customer_reviews.title: They loved it and had a fun time putting it together
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a Snoopy collector. They loved it and had a fun time putting it together. It looks great next to their other Peanuts items and is very cute! It does have really small parts however so may not be best for children.
customer_reviews.author: T. H.

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Was fun for son and I to build. It's a cute set
customer_reviews.author: J Christ

customer_reviews.title: Amazing set! Simple to build & amazing quality.
customer_reviews.text: Affordable and great quality. Compared to other building sets that we all know...this brand measures up if not more! We have the entire peanuts collection of building sets.
customer_reviews.author: Gcrew

customer_reviews.title: Fun and Cute
customer_reviews.text: It is very cute and fun for me to put together. I am using it as decoration for my baby's 3rd birthday. I would not really recommend this for small children because the pieces are small and a little hard to put together.
customer_reviews.author: charavon

customer_reviews.title: Good deal for the money
customer_reviews.text: Good for a knock off brand of lego. I got all the sets. Good deal for the money. Cute and fun with the lights that come on.
customer_reviews.author: Melonie Mattson

customer_reviews.title: A small box
customer_reviews.text: It is for my 5 year old nephew who loves lego
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen Kling

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my niece for her birthday. She's a big Snoopy fan
customer_reviews.author: B. Diehl

customer_reviews.title: Lucy should be her dr stand
customer_reviews.text: So they put Lucy in lemonade stand not her dr stand one star off for that.
customer_reviews.author: John P Wilkerson

customer_reviews.title: fun to play yet not to complicated
customer_reviews.text: just as shown on the picture. fun to play yet not to complicated.
customer_reviews.author: tree

customer_reviews.title: Made my sons day
customer_reviews.text: My son really enjoyed putting this together and most of all it lighting up
customer_reviews.author: James Simeone

customer_reviews.title: The detail is excellent. I would recommend it to a
customer_reviews.text: This item is so cute. The detail is excellent. I would recommend it to a friend
customer_reviews.author: Donna Lef

customer_reviews.title: Item did not work
customer_reviews.text: item did not work when we opened package. My son was very disappointed and I was too. LED switch left in on position and light burnt out to start with. Sad Easter morning!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Welling

customer_reviews.title: OVERPRICED
customer_reviews.text: VERY OVERPRICED FOR SUCH A SMALL SET. I KNOW THEY LIGHT UP BUT ONLY A VERY SMALL 1 INCH AREA LIGHTS UP AND IT'S NOT VERY BRIGHT. YOU DO NEED BATTERIES.
customer_reviews.author: ChattyCathy

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Tried batteries, brand new and the light up part didn't work no matter what we did. Cute leggo set up though.
customer_reviews.author: MsChris

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Gift
customer_reviews.text: This is a Christmas present for my grandchild. She requested, so I am sure she will like it. The price was great, too.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C. Bostwick

product_meta.title: Lite Brix The Peanuts Movie Lemonade Stand Building Set
